text:
What's up everyone? Today we're learning English 
with the incredible Disney animation Moana.

In this lesson you'll have a lot 
of fun learning English with Moana

and the character Maui, 
which is voiced by The Rock.

In case you're new here, I want to let you 
know that every week we make lessons to help

you learn fast English. Without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes and without subtitles.

In fact, Della says that our lessons 
are interesting and understandable,

without being boring. So if that sounds good 
to you don't forget to hit that Subscribe

button and the Bell down below, so that 
you don't miss any of our new lessons.

We are very close to reaching 3 Million 
subscribers here on Learn English with TV.

And so to thank you we are holding a very 
special contest over on our Instagram page,

where you can win our Fluent with Friends course.
In this 48-week course you will learn with the

first two seasons of Friends. You'll receive pdf 
power lessons every week, vocabulary memorization

software, access to our Fluency Circle Global 
Community, and so much more! If you head over

to our Instagram @reallife.english you will find 
all the information there, so that you can enter,

and I will be going live next week to 
announce the competition winners. Good luck!

If you're enjoying this lesson, then I highly 
recommend that you check out our lesson

with the incredible animation Inside Out, where 
you can learn vocabulary related to emotions.

So you can click up here or in the description 
box below to watch that lesson next.
